Generation IX.Scarlet: Toedscool lives in muggy forests. The flaps that fall from its body are chewy and very delicious.
Generation IX.Violet: Though it looks like Tentacool , Toedscool is a completely different species. Its legs may be thin, but it can run at a speed of 30 mph .
